QuestData.Title: An End to the Suffering
QuestData.Description: The key to lifting the curse of this place rests in the final death of Darkmaster Gandling.$B$BDo it, $p, and make him suffer!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Kill the Darkmaster to lift the curse.
QuestData.RewardText: Behold my true form.$B$BI owe you a debt, one which I can never repay. But, I thank you for lifting the curse off of my family.$B$BKel'Thuzad, the Lich King, and now Darkmaster Gandling -- all are dead.$B$BPerhaps now I too can find some semblance of peace.
